definition: to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收费连政府通过税，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: Sitting at his toll booth one day, the publican saw Jesus approaching.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，马太坐在税关上，看见耶稣向他走来。

sentences.english: No taxes on IBCs; low tax rate for domestic companies.
sentences.chinese: 没有税，国内公司低税率。

sentences.english: The state government claims they have reduced personal taxation.
sentences.chinese: 州政府声称已经减收了个人税。

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我们请了一位税务咨询师，以便我们少交点税。

sentences.english: But high taxes do not always mean expensive cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 高额烟草税不总能让烟价高不可攀。

sentences.english: Any cigarettes in 1925 Guichi County Tax Bureau.
The money I receive is gross and has not been taxed.
sentences.chinese: 我收到的钱是总的税前收入，没有扣过税的。

sentences.english: Gives high earners big breaks on the payroll tax.
sentences.chinese: 给予高收入者较大幅度的收入税减免。

sentences.english: Other federal taxes include the corporate profit tax and social insurance (Social Security) taxes.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府的其他税收还有公司利润税和社会保险税。

sentences.english: Other federal taxes include the corporate profit tax and social insurance (Social Security) taxes.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府的其他税收还有公司利润税和社会保险税。

sentences.english: This year, China introduced an environment tax all of a sudden.
sentences.chinese: 而今年，中国突然引入环境税。

sentences.english: Every day I see the two-headed monster of tax and red tape.
sentences.chinese: 每天都得与税和红章这两头怪兽打交道。

sentences.english: Therefore, to timely collect environmental taxation is imperative.
sentences.chinese: 因而，适时征收环境税已势在必行。

sentences.english: Ad valorem duties are levied on the basis of the product's value.
sentences.chinese: 从价税是以商品的价值为基础而征收的税。

sentences.english: Others include luxury tax, inheritance tax, and corporate income tax.
sentences.chinese: 其他包括奢侈税，继承税和企业所得税。

definition: personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
not liable to taxation (of monastery, imperial family etc)/tax free/duty free (shop)
